last_episode_to_air.name: Episode 9
last_episode_to_air.overview: Back in Paris, Julia does not know what to do with Adam; the latter arrives at her home and makes a startling discovery.

name: All Those Things We Never Said
original_name: Toutes ces choses qu'on ne s'est pas dites
overview: Three days before her wedding, Julia receives a phone call saying her father will not attend the ceremony because he is dead. After the funeral, the daughter receives a coffin containing a father-like android with all his memories.

episodes.name: Episode 1
episodes.overview: Julia finds herself at her father's funeral on the day she was supposed to get married. After, she receives an unexpected delivery.

episodes.name: Episode 2
episodes.overview: Michel and Julia are in Bruges; in the crowd, the young woman thinks she recognizes Christian, her father's faithful personal assistant; Julia remembers her childhood sweetheart, Tomas, whom she had met in Berlin when the Wall came down.

episodes.name: Episode 3
episodes.overview: While Julia thought her great love died in Afghanistan, she discovers that he is alive, which Michel was perfectly aware of; all this time, he hid this information from her and never gave her a letter from Tomas received in 1991.

episodes.name: Episode 4
episodes.overview: Adam, furious, is convinced that Julia is in Bruges with a lover. For their part, Julia and Michel take advantage of these few days together to get closer than ever. After arriving in Berlin, they set off in search of Tomas.

episodes.name: Episode 5
episodes.overview: While Julia searches for him in Berlin, Tomas is in Madrid; he is still a journalist and works with his friend Jürgen Knapp for a Berlin-based newspaper; he is about to go on a trip to Africa.

episodes.name: Episode 6
episodes.overview: Julia manages to meet Knapp at a gala; cornered, he lies by claiming that Tomas lives in Madrid with his wife and that they run a restaurant; annoyed, Julia is ready to leave Berlin.

episodes.name: Episode 7
episodes.overview: Having learned that Knapp had lied to her, Julia returns to see him; Knapp claims she had broken the heart of Tomas in 1991 by not answering his letter, except that she had never received it.

episodes.name: Episode 8
episodes.overview: Julia wants to leave Berlin, but her father persuades her to continue looking for Tomas; the latter learns from Knapp that Julia is looking for him; at the place of their first meeting, the former lovers finally meet again.

episodes.name: Episode 9
episodes.overview: Back in Paris, Julia does not know what to do with Adam; the latter arrives at her home and makes a startling discovery.
